ValidationRule.description: If Record Type = '401k Incoming Checks and ACHs' and Transmission Method = 'Chase 401k' and Amount is greater than $100,000, then the Ready for Trade date field cannot be populated (saved) until the $100k Approval is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Ready_for_Trade__c ), $RecordType.Name = "401k Incoming Checks and ACHs", ISPICKVAL(Transmission_Method__c,"Chase 401k"), Amount__c > 100000, X100k_Approval__c = false )
